title: Forest Patrol
description: The town guard needs help clearing dangerous creatures from the forest paths.
questText: The forest paths have become dangerous with wolves prowling about. Travelers are afraid to venture out. Could you help us by eliminating 5 of these forest wolves? The safety of our town depends on it.
completionText: Well done, adventurer! The forest paths are much safer now. Here's your reward for serving the town so well.
